statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, media_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE media_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT media_id FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, user_id, media_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE media_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(media_id) AS media_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(media_id) > 1
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_interaction DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, media_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT media_name, media_type, media_duration FROM media_content ORDER BY media_name DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, media_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, media_id ASC
SELECT media_name, media_type, media_duration FROM media_content WHERE media_type = 'Video' AND media_duration > 60 ORDER BY media_name ASC

SELECT user_id, media_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE media_id IN (SELECT media_id FROM media_content WHERE media_type = 'Video') ORDER BY user_id DESC, interaction_date ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT DISTINCT media_type FROM media_content ORDER BY media_type ASC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE media_id = 123
SELECT media_id, media_title FROM media_content
SELECT media_id, media_title, media_type FROM media_content WHERE upload_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM analysis_results
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT media_id, media_title FROM media_content WHERE media_type = 'video' AND upload_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT user_id, media_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM user_interactions INNER JOIN media_content ON user_interactions.media_id = media_content.media_id WHERE media_type = 'image' ORDER BY user_id ASC, interaction_time ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'sentiment' AND media_id IN (SELECT media_id FROM media_content WHERE upload_time >= '2022-03-01');

SELECT u.user_id, u.interaction_type, m.media_title, a.analysis_result FROM user_interactions u LEFT JOIN media_content m ON u.media_id = m.media_id LEFT JOIN analysis_results a ON u.media_id = a.media_id WHERE u.interaction_type = 'like' AND a.analysis_type = 'classification' ORDER BY u.user_id DESC, a.analysis_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT title, rating FROM media_content WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, rating FROM users JOIN user_ratings ON users.user_id = user_ratings.user_id WHERE rating >= 4.0;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM media_content WHERE category = 'Movies' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.username, m.title, ur.rating FROM users u JOIN user_ratings ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN media_content m ON ur.content_id = m.content_id WHERE ur.rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY ur.rating DESC, m.title ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT title, category FROM media_content WHERE category = 'Action' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('like', 'comment');
SELECT user_id, media_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE user_id = 5 AND rating > 3 ORDER BY rating_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, category FROM media_content ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(media_id) AS interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT media_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_ratings GROUP BY media_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
